statements: SELECT * FROM experiments
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, researcher_name FROM experiments
SELECT experiment_name FROM experiments WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice'
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT experiment_name, researcher_name FROM experiments ORDER BY experiment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, researcher_name FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY experiment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE researcher_name IN ('Alice Smith', 'Bob Johnson') ORDER BY experiment_id ASC, experiment_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice Smith' AND experiment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_experiments FROM experiments;
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT id, experiment_name FROM experiments ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE id=1;
SELECT * FROM observations ORDER BY observation_date ASC;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_description FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments JOIN observations ON experiments.id = observations.experiment_id WHERE observations.observation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT experiment_name, COUNT(*) AS observation_count FROM experiments JOIN observations ON experiments.id = observations.experiment_id GROUP BY experiment_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT e.experiment_name, o.observation_data FROM experiments e JOIN observations o ON e.id = o.experiment_id WHERE e.id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT experiment_name, experiment_description FROM experiments WHERE LENGTH(experiment_description) > 100 ORDER BY experiment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM observation_data;
SELECT experiment_name, researcher_name FROM observation_data;
SELECT experiment_date, researcher_name FROM observation_data WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT experiment_name, result_value FROM observation_data JOIN experiment_results ON observation_data.experiment_id = experiment_results.experiment_id;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM researchers;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date, researcher_name FROM observation_data WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice'
SELECT * FROM observation_data WHERE experiment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT result_value, result_description FROM experiment_results WHERE result_value > 10 ORDER BY result_value DESC
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM researchers WHERE researcher_affiliation = 'University XYZ'
SELECT experiment_name, researcher_name FROM observation_data INNER JOIN researchers ON observation_data.researcher_name = researchers.researcher_name
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT sample_name, sample_description FROM samples WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT measurement_value, measurement_unit FROM measurements WHERE measurement_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_description FROM experiments WHERE experiment_id = 100;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email, researcher_department FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT sample_name, sample_description FROM samples WHERE researcher_id = 200 ORDER BY sample_name ASC;
SELECT measurement_value, measurement_unit FROM measurements WHERE sample_id = 500 ORDER BY measurement_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiment;
SELECT study_id, experiment_name FROM experiment ORDER BY date_conducted DESC;
SELECT * FROM study WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, researcher_name FROM researcher WHERE department = 'Biology';
SELECT study_name, researcher_name FROM study JOIN researcher ON study.researcher_name = researcher.researcher_name;
SELECT * FROM experiment;
SELECT experiment_name, date_conducted FROM experiment WHERE id = 1;
SELECT experiment.*, study.study_name FROM experiment JOIN study ON experiment.study_id = study.id;
SELECT researcher.researcher_name, experiment_data.data_type, experiment_data.data_value FROM researcher JOIN experiment_data ON researcher.id = experiment_data.id;
SELECT study_data.study_id, study_data.data_type, study_data.data_value FROM study_data WHERE data_value > 100;
